casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Lee SANDERS. No. 362A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 11, 2005. Anne Bleyman, for Michael Lee Sanders. Michael Parker, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of July 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of July 2005."
